structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXX. AIRCRAFT NOISE ABATEMENT ADVISORY BOARD FOR MIAMI INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT

text.section:
Sec. 2-2035. Powers and duties.
Functions. The NAAB shall consider present and future aircraft noise impacts arising from operations at MIA. With the assistance of staff, the NAAB shall explore, consider and recommend programs and practices that may be helpful in reducing or mitigating aircraft noise impacts.
Report. The NAAB shall submit an annual written report to the Board of County Commissioners.
